name: Titanium.UI.iPhone.ScrollIndicatorStyle
summary: A set of constants for the styles available for scrollbars used with scrollIndicatorStyle and scrollIndicatorStyle properties.

constants.name: BLACK
constants.summary: A style of indicator which is black smaller than the default style. This style is good against a white content background.

constants.name: DEFAULT
constants.summary: The default style of scroll indicator, which is black with a white border. This style is good against any content background.

constants.name: WHITE
constants.summary: A style of indicator is white and smaller than the default style. This style is good against a black content background.
